alert.note: Alert for Coastal Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:26AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WATERSPOUT OFF THE COAST OF EDISTO BEACH... At 925 AM EDT...trained weather spotters reported several waterspouts just offshore of Edisto Beach State Park, drifting near the beaches. HAZARD...Waterspout. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...There is a slight chance that the waterspout could move onshore as a very brief tornado. Light objects such as lawn furniture could become airborne if this occurs. Minor tree damage is possible. Some coastal locations that could be impacted include... Edisto Beach.
info.instruction: Waterspouts that move onshore become tornadoes. A tornado warning may be needed shortly if confidence in the waterspout moving onshore increases. Be prepared to take quick action if the waterspout approaches your location. Move to an interior room and away from windows.
